name: Sandrisen
description:
Sandrisen is an endless action game where you play as a guardian and its sentinel, trying to survive against enemy sentinels. Equipped with only a blade and your trusty sentinels abilities, how long can you remain standing?

Move your sentinel with the WASD keys or the arrow keys.

Dash towards your sentinel with spacebar or K.

The first version of Sandrisen was made in 48 hours, for the first GMTK Game Jam.
